SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model.observer

Interface IBoardListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BattleshipView, BinaryView, BoardView, FillapixView, GridBoardView, HeyawakeView, LightUpView, MasyuView, MinesweeperView, NurikabeView, ShortTruthTableView, SkyscrapersView, StarBattleView, SudokuView, ThermometerView, TreeTentView
public interface IBoardListener
IBoardListener defines methods for receiving notifications about changes to the board, including updates to tree elements, case boards, and puzzle elements.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onBoardDataChanged(PuzzleElement puzzleElement)
    Called when a PuzzleElement's data on the board has changed.
    void
    onCaseBoardAdded(CaseBoard caseBoard)
    Called when a case board has been added to the view.
    void
    onTreeElementChanged(TreeElement treeElement)
    Called when the tree element has changed.

      Called when the tree element has changed.
      Parameters:
      treeElement - tree element

      Called when a case board has been added to the view.
      Parameters:
